abstract.t: This document defines two new configuration attributes for Internet Key Exchange Protocol version 2 (IKEv2). These attributes can be used for carrying the IPv4 and IPv6 address of the Proxy-Call Control and Service function (P-CSCF). When an IPSec gateway delivers these attributes to an IPsec client, it can obtain the IPv4 and/or IPv6 address of the P-CSCF server located in the home network.
